is.ru.tictactoe

Class ConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.tictactoe.ConsoleUI

  • public class ConsoleUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes care of the gameplay, prints out the board, gets input from the users
    Since:
    2.11.2015

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean confirmAction(java.lang.String action)
      This method propmts from the player a confirmation (boolean answer: yes or no) before performing an action, gives him/her a warning if their action causes some changes to the game

      This method displays message that confirms name change

      This method prints out to the screen the name of the winner or the massage that there is a tie

      This method prints to the screen message at the end of the game

      Displays the help for the user interface

      This method prints out a prompt
      void displayReset()
      This method prints to the screen message where the players are informed that the game has been reset

      This method prints out to the screen the current score
      void displayTurn(Player player)
      This method prints out to the screen which player´s turn is up
      void displayWelcome()
      This method prints to the screen message when the game starts
      void draw()
      This method draws (prints out to the screen) the numbered grid for the Tic Tac Toe game
      static void draw(Board board)
      This method draws (prints out to the screen) the grid and also assigns 'x' when true and 'o' when false to distinguish between two players
      java.lang.String getInputFirstPlayer()
      This method gets the name of the first player
      int getInputNumber()
      This method gets the input from the player, validates it (checks if it is in range 0-8)
      java.lang.String getInputSecondPlayer()
      This method gets the name of the second player
      int getMove()
      This method fetches moves from players.
      void invalidArgument()
      This method prints out to the screen message to the user that the argument is invalid.
      void invalidArgument(java.lang.String arg)
      This method prints out to the screen message to the user that the string input that was entered is invalid.
      void invalidCommand(java.lang.String com)
      This method prints out to the screen message to the user that the command that was entered is invalid.
      java.lang.Boolean players()
      This method allows the player to choose hers/his opponent It requires an character input from the player, the letter 'H' for the human opponent or the letter 'C' for the computerAI
      boolean promptContinue()
      This method returns boolean value (true/false) that depends on the input from the user whether he/she wants to continue the game, if so the game will be set to reset.
      void promptIllegalMove()
      This method prints out to the screen message to the player when the move is illegal.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        This method draws (prints out to the screen) the numbered grid for the Tic Tac Toe game

      • draw

        public static void draw(Board board)
        This method draws (prints out to the screen) the grid and also assigns 'x' when true and 'o' when false to distinguish between two players
        Parameters:
        board - a grid 3x3 for the game

      • getMove

        public int getMove()
        This method fetches moves from players. The move is an integer.
        Returns:
        if there is a possible move the return statement will return the integer with the index to the squere that was chosen by player, otherwise it returns -1.

      • displayTurn

        public void displayTurn(Player player)
        This method prints out to the screen which player´s turn is up
        Parameters:
        player - An instance of the player

      • getInputFirstPlayer

        public java.lang.String getInputFirstPlayer()
        This method gets the name of the first player
        Returns:
        returns the string with the name of the first player

      • getInputSecondPlayer

        public java.lang.String getInputSecondPlayer()
        This method gets the name of the second player
        Returns:
        returns the string with the name of the second player

      • getInputNumber

        public int getInputNumber()
        This method gets the input from the player, validates it (checks if it is in range 0-8)
        Returns:
        an integer which is an input from the player

      • promptContinue

        public boolean promptContinue()
        This method returns boolean value (true/false) that depends on the input from the user whether he/she wants to continue the game, if so the game will be set to reset.
        Returns:
        boolean value true if the player wants to play another round or false when the player does not wants to play another turn

      • promptIllegalMove

        public void promptIllegalMove()
        This method prints out to the screen message to the player when the move is illegal.

      • display

        public void display(Player winner)
        This method prints out to the screen the name of the winner or the massage that there is a tie
        Parameters:
        winner - the player that has won a game

      • displayScore

        public void displayScore(Player p1,
                         Player p2)
        This method prints out to the screen the current score
        Parameters:
        p1 - an instance of the Player1
        p2 - an instance of the Player2

      • displayPrompt

        public java.lang.String displayPrompt()
        This method prints out a prompt
        Returns:
        a string from the player or an empty string when there was no input from the player

      • displayHelp

        public void displayHelp()
        Displays the help for the user interface

      • displayWelcome

        public void displayWelcome()
        This method prints to the screen message when the game starts

        This method prints to the screen message at the end of the game

        public void displayReset()
        This method prints to the screen message where the players are informed that the game has been reset

      • confirmNameChange

        public void confirmNameChange(java.lang.String newname,
                              java.lang.String oldname)
        This method displays message that confirms name change
        Parameters:
        newname - a string input from the user wwhich contains a new name of the player
        oldname - a string input from the user wwhich contains an old name of the player

      • players

        public java.lang.Boolean players()
        This method allows the player to choose hers/his opponent It requires an character input from the player, the letter 'H' for the human opponent or the letter 'C' for the computerAI
        Returns:
        boolean value true when player choses to play agains another human player or false when player choses to play against the computerAI

      • invalidArgument

        public void invalidArgument(java.lang.String arg)
        This method prints out to the screen message to the user that the string input that was entered is invalid. It also suggests to the user the possibility of typing command 'help' for help
        Parameters:
        arg - string input that was entered by the user

      • invalidArgument

        public void invalidArgument()
        This method prints out to the screen message to the user that the argument is invalid. It also suggests to the user the possibility of typing command 'help' for help

      • invalidCommand

        public void invalidCommand(java.lang.String com)
        This method prints out to the screen message to the user that the command that was entered is invalid. It also suggests to the user the possibility of typing command 'help' for help
        Parameters:
        com - command that was entered by the user

      • confirmAction

        public boolean confirmAction(java.lang.String action)
        This method propmts from the player a confirmation (boolean answer: yes or no) before performing an action, gives him/her a warning if their action causes some changes to the game
        Parameters:
        action - a string from the user with an action that user wishes to perform
        Returns:
        boolean value true when player confirms his/hers action, or false when player cancels his/hers action
